title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
OB: The label height remains the same after modifying the font size.
EB: The label height should adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
3. Observe that the label height does not change to fit the new font size.
